data.name: manifestNotFound
data.comment: {Locked}Error to show when the manifest for a component id is not found.

data.name: extensionInitFailure
data.value: Extension failed to initialize for componentId "{0}".
data.comment: {Locked}Error to show when the extension failed to initialize. {0} is the component id for the extension.

data.name: extensionLoadFailure
data.value: Extension failed to load for componentId "{0}".
data.comment: {Locked}Error to show when the extension for a component id is not found.

data.name: expectingBaseExtension
data.value: Expecting a class that extends BaseExtension.
data.comment: {Locked}Error to show when the loaded class does not extend BaseExtension.

data.name: wrongExtensionType
data.comment: {Locked}Error to show when the loaded class does not extend the type expected by manifest.
